manutd.name: Manchester United Home Jersey 2024/25
manutd.description: Official Adidas Manchester United Home Jersey 2024/25. Lightweight, breathable, and made with 100% recycled polyester.

reviews.text: The quality is excellent, feels premium!
reviews.author: Alex, London

reviews.text: Delivery was a bit slow but authentic.
reviews.author: Priya, Mumbai

barca.name: FC Barcelona Home Jersey 2024/25
